bannerSubtitle: Insights to drive your business forward
featureOneDescription: Leverage cutting-edge analytics tools to gain deep insights into your data. Our intuitive interface makes complex data analysis simple and accessible.
featureTwoDescription: Easily integrate with a wide range of third-party services and platforms. Our flexible architecture ensures smooth connectivity and data flow.
featureThreeDescription: Tailor your workflows to fit your unique business needs. Our platform offers extensive customization options, allowing for a highly personalized experience.
whoWeAreText: Founded by a team of passionate data scientists and analysts, DataFlow has established itself as a leader in the field of data analytics. With a rich history rooted in innovation and a commitment to excellence, we offer a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen. Our core values revolve around integrity, collaboration, and the relentless pursuit of delivering value to our clients.
ourVisionText: At DataFlow, our vision is to be at the forefront of data-driven transformation. We aim to empower businesses by uncovering hidden patterns, predicting trends, and providing a deeper understanding of their data. Our goal is to be a catalyst for change, helping organizations navigate the complexities of the digital age with confidence.
ourTeamText: Our strength lies in our diverse team of experts who bring a wealth of knowledge and experience in data science, analytics, and industry-specific insights. From seasoned data strategists to innovative analysts, each member of our team is dedicated to helping our clients harness the power of their data. We pride ourselves on a collaborative culture that fosters creativity and continuous learning.
dataAnalyticsDescription: Comprehensive data analysis services to help you extract meaningful insights from complex datasets. Our experts use advanced tools for predictive modeling and data visualization.
dataIntegrationDescription: Seamless integration of disparate data sources for a unified view. We ensure secure and efficient data consolidation, enhancing your decision-making process.
customDataSolutionsDescription: Bespoke data solutions tailored to your specific business needs. From custom analytics to personalized reporting, we provide solutions that align with your business goals.
contactDescription: Feel free to get in touch with us for any inquiries.
dataAnalyticsDescription-2: Explore our comprehensive data analytics services, designed to help you unlock the full potential of your data. Our team employs the latest tools and techniques in data science to provide you with deep insights and predictive analytics, aiding your decision-making process.
dataIntegrationDescription-2: Our data integration services focus on consolidating your disparate data sources into a cohesive, accessible, and secure framework. This integration enables more effective data management and analysis, supporting a comprehensive view of your business operations.
customDataSolutionsDescription-2: Tailored to your unique business requirements, our custom data solutions provide targeted analytics, reporting, and data management services. We work closely with you to develop bespoke solutions that align with your business objectives and enhance operational efficiency.

errorDescription: Please try again later or contact support.
name: Name
userAdministrationPanelDescription: This page is only accessible to administrators.
userAdministrationAccesible: User administration panel accessible only to administrators.
userSearchDescription: Search for users by ID, name, surname, role or email.

notAuthorizedDescription-2: Please contact your administrator for more information.
orderSucceded: Your order has been successfully submitted.
csvFileDontHaveExpectedHeaders: The CSV file does not have the expected headers.
csvFileIsEmptyOrCannotBeRead: The CSV file is empty or could not be read.
fileIsNotCsv: The file is not a CSV file.
modelDescriptionParagraph: Šiame skyriuje pateikiama išsami modelio veikimo metrikų apžvalga. Šių metrikų supratimas yra būtinas norint įvertinti modelio prognozavimo tikslumą ir patikimumą.
MseDescription: Indicates the average squared difference between the estimated values and the actual value.
RmseDescription: Represents the square root of the second sample moment of the differences between predicted values and observed values.
MaeDescription: Measures the average magnitude of the errors in a set of predictions, without considering their direction.
R2Description: Provides a measure of how well observed outcomes are replicated by the model, based on the proportion of total variation of outcomes explained by the model.
simpleCsvDataTemplateExplainingText-1: This CSV file contain the following columns:
simpleCsvDataTemplateExplainingText-2: ID, Country, City, Order Date, Product Name, Unit Price, Quantity, Total Price, Category Name, Weekday, Public Holiday, Season, Month, Year, Price Change Indicator, 7-day Moving Average, Category Seasonality Index, Competitor Pricing, Marketing Spend, Customer Average Rating, Inventory Level, Online Search Trend.
simpleCsvDataTemplateExplainingText-3: Each row in this CSV represents a simple data template that we prepared for automated data analysis.
idDescription: The unique ID of the order.
countryDescription: The country where the order was made.
cityDescription: The city where the order was made.
orderDateDescription: The date when the order was made.
unitPriceDescription: The unit price of the product.
totalPriceDescription: The total price of the order.
categoryNameDescription: The name of the product category.
weekdayDescription: The day of the week when the order was made.
publicHolidayDescription: Indicates whether the order was made on a public holiday.
seasonDescription: The season when the order was made.
monthDescription: The month when the order was made.
yearDescription: The year when the order was made.
priceChangeIndicatorDescription: Indicates whether the price of the product has changed.
7-dayMovingAverageDescription: The average of the last 7 days.
categorySeasonalityIndexDescription: The seasonality index of the product category.
customerAverageRatingDescription: The average rating of the customer.

examplesOfSimpleDataTemplateExplainingTe: Also, you can download the simple data template example in
understandingRegressionAnalysisExplainin: Regression analysis is a powerful statistical method used for predicting and forecasting data. It helps in understanding the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables. Widely used in various fields for making informed predictions, regression analysis analyzes historical data to forecast future trends and outcomes. This section explores the basics of regression, its significance, and its application in accurate data forecasting.
simplifyingRegressionAnalysis: Simplifying Regression with Our Custom Template
simplifyingRegressionAnalysisExplainingT: Our user-friendly CSV template is designed to make regression analysis straightforward. It features specific columns for different data types, ensuring seamless data integration. Fill in your data in the designated columns, and our system will automatically perform a detailed regression analysis, providing reliable forecast analysis with ease and accuracy.
tailoredDataAnalysisExplainingText: If your dataset does not align with our standard CSV template, our tailored data analysis services are here to help. Provide your unique dataset, and our experts will conduct a comprehensive regression analysis, offering personalized insights and forecasts. This bespoke service ensures precise and relevant analysis for any data structure.
